alert.note: Alert for Greenville Mountains; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 31 at 4:48AM EST until January 31 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Georgia, Rabun County. In North Carolina, Graham County. In South Carolina, the mountains of Oconee, Pickens, and Greenville Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy dense fog could linger in a few areas as late as noon today.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights and fog lamps, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Greenville Mountains; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains
